oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: American Ace Show - 1956-11-17
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program American Ace Show, held at the Ryman on November 17, 1956 before the Martha White Opry segment. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Jim Reeves (host, performer), Don Helms (performer), Jean Shepard (performer), and George Jones (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Reeves; Jean Shepard; George Jones
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: American Ace jingle (Minnie Pearl) -- American Ace jingle -- Opening statement (Grant Turner) -- Theme -- Opening statement (Jim Reeves) -- According To My Heart (Jim Reeves) -- American Ace commercial (Grant Turner) -- Jim Reeves introduces Jean Shepard -- Hey, Good Lookin' (Jean Shepard) -- Jim Reeves introduces George Jones -- You Gotta Be My Baby (George Jones) -- American Ace commercial (Grant Turner) -- American Ace jingle -- Then I'll Stop Loving You (Jim Reeves) -- American Ace commercial (Grant Turner) -- Closing statement (Jim Reeves) -- American Ace jingle -- Theme -- Closing statement (Grant Turner) -- American Ace jingle (Minnie Pearl) -- Announcer opening statement for following program
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Life & Accident Insurance Company, Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.); American ace show (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Reeves, Jim; Helms, Don (Guitarist); Shepard, Jean, 1933-; Minnie Pearl; Jones, George, 1931-2013
